hero_description: I build accessible, pixel-perfect digital experiences for the web.

about_section.title: Brittany Chiang
about_section.description_1: I am a Frontend Developer passionate about creating smooth, optimized, and intuitive web experiences. I am currently studying at FPT Polytechnic College, majoring in Web Development. Throughout my studies, I have worked on various personal and group projects, helping me improve my programming skills, UI/UX design thinking, and user interface optimization.

short_term_goals.title: Short-term Goals
short_term_goals.goal_1: Develop in-depth Frontend skills, especially in React, Next.js, and TypeScript.
short_term_goals.goal_2: Enhance teamwork skills in an Agile/Scrum environment.
short_term_goals.goal_3: Improve IT-related English skills to communicate and read technical documents better.

long_term_goals.title: Long-term Goals
long_term_goals.goal_1: Become a professional Frontend Developer, capable of building smooth UI/UX, optimizing performance, and improving user experience.
long_term_goals.goal_2: Expand knowledge in Backend (Node.js, NestJS, MongoDB/PostgreSQL) to become a Full Stack Developer.
long_term_goals.goal_3: Continuously update on new technologies, enhance programming thinking, and problem-solving skills.
